verses.verse: And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H2416>thing,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H854>with<s%> him in the <S%H8392>ark:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> made a <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7918>assuaged;<s%>

The <S%H4599>fountains<s%> also of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> and the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> were <S%H5534>stopped,<s%> and the <S%H1653>rain<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> was <S%H3607>restrained;<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1980>continually:<s%> <S%H7725><s%> and after the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H2637>abated.<s%>

And the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7651>seventeenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat.<s%>

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H2637>decreased<s%> <S%H1961>continually<s%> <S%H1980><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month:<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> month, on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> were the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> at the <S%H4480>end<s%> <S%H7093><s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2474>window<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had made: <S%H6213><s%>

And he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H6158>raven,<s%> which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to and <S%H3318>fro,<s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H3001>up<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

Also he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> him, to <S%H7200>see<s%> if the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7043>abated<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground;<s%>

But the <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4494>rest<s%> for the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of her <S%H7272>foot,<s%> and she <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth:<s%> then he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> her, and pulled her <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>

And he <S%H2342>stayed<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3254>again<s%> he sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3123>dove<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8392>ark;<s%>

And the <S%H3123>dove<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him <S%H6256>in<s%> the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> in her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> was an <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> plucked <S%H2965>off:<s%> so <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H7043>abated<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And he <S%H3176>stayed<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and sent <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3123>dove;<s%> which <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundredth<s%> and <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were dried <S%H2717>up<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> was <S%H2717>dry.<s%>
And in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> was the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3001>dried.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Go <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8392>ark,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee.

Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee <S%H3605>every<s%> living <S%H2416>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H854>with<s%> thee, of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> both of <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and of <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and of <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> that they may breed <S%H8317>abundantly<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and be <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him:

Every <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2416>beast,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> creeping <S%H7431>thing,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H7430>creepeth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> after their <S%H4940>kinds,<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H8392>ark.<s%>

And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7306>smelled<s%> a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7381>savor;<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> for man's <S%H5668>sake;<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H7451>evil<s%> from his <S%H4480>youth;<s%> <S%H5271><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H5221>smite<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605>thing<s%> <S%H2416>living,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6213>done.<s%>

While <S%H5750><s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3605>remaineth,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H2233>seedtime<s%> and <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and <S%H7120>cold<s%> and <S%H2527>heat,<s%> and <S%H7019>summer<s%> and <S%H2779>winter,<s%> and <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7673>cease.<s%>
